Audio Description: The hand of a Nazi dominates this poster warning against carelessly passing on information about troop movements. At the top of the poster printed in white bold letters on a dark background are the words: “Bits of Careless Talk Are Pieced Together By the Enemy.” The menacing hand of the Nazi putting together a puzzle has furrowed fingers, bulging veins and a Swastika ring. The puzzle pieces are orange and yellow the words printed in black “Convoy sails for England tonight.” The Nazi is placing the last piece of the puzzle with the word “England” on it into place.
Creator: United States. War Department. Army Service Forces. Adjutant General's Office
Description: Poster, 70 x 50 cm, artist: Stevan Dohanos

Title: Bits of careless talk are pieced together by the enemy
